item.title: AI-Machine-Learning-Buzzword-Bingo
item.description: I was recently invited to join a panel discussion among developers to dispel the myth of the typical BS Buzzword Bingo around machine learning and AI. In this blog post, I will share some buzzwords we talked about with a little description and links. Ooops, I already used some buzzwords. So let’s start. AI (Artificial Intelligence) is the magic portion to fix all problems of all companies and will make us unemployed in the future.
